description.name: Kalosze męskie czarne r.42 (5)
description.long_desc:
Kalosze PCV są szczelne, zabezpieczają przed wodą, wilgocią, olejami i poślizgiem na podłożu płytki ceramicznej (SR).

Oznakowanie wyrobu PCV:
ISO 20347:2021 - zgodność z podstawowymi wymaganiami normy dla obuwia zawodowego
OB - spełnia podstawowe wymagania dla obuwia zawodowego, w tym odporność podeszw na poślizg na podłożu ceramicznym pokrytym roztworem NaLS
CI - izolacja spodu od zimna
FO - odporność podeszw na olej napędowy
SR - odporność podeszw na poślizg na podłożu ceramicznym pokrytym glicerolem

Dane techniczne
Wierzch i spód PVC
Podszewka dzianina poliamidowa
System montażu formowanie metodą wtrysku
Dostępne rozmiary 39-46
Kolor czarny
Wysokość 38 cm
Normy Produkt zgodny z normą ISO 20347:2021

description.name: Women's EVA Wellington size 36
description.long_desc:
The EVA material footwear is designed for everyday use and recreational activities such as gardening, agriculture, fishing, and hunting. It provides protection against cold and moisture, ensuring complete insulation from the ground and safeguarding against low temperatures (down to -30°C). The footwear is exceptionally lightweight, facilitating extended use over multiple hours. Additionally, it features slip resistance according to SRC standards.


This EVA footwear is versatile, providing comfort and protection across various outdoor activities while meeting safety standards.


Technical Data
































Upper and SoleEVA
InsoleFelt
Mounting SystemInjection Molding Method
Available Sizes36-40
ColorOlive
Height27 cm
StandardsProduct compliant with the requirements of PPE and Regulation (EU) 2016/425

Mounting SystemInjection Molding Method
Available Sizes41-46
ColorOlive
Height30 cm
StandardsProduct compliant with the requirements of PPE and Regulation (EU) 2016/425
description.short_desc:
The EVA material footwear is designed for everyday use and recreational activities such as gardening, agriculture, fishing, and hunting. It provides protection against cold and moisture, ensuring complete insulation from the ground and safeguarding against low temperatures (down to -30°C). The footwear is exceptionally lightweight, facilitating extended use over multiple hours. Additionally, it features slip resistance according to SRC standards.


This EVA footwear is versatile, providing comfort and protection across various outdoor activities while meeting safety standards.

description.name: Men's Rubber Boots, size 39
description.long_desc:
PCV wellington boots are watertight, providing protection against water, moisture, oils, and slip on ceramic tile surfaces (SR). The footwear, with felt lining, ensures insulation from cold surfaces.


These PVC wellington boots are marked according to ISO standards, offering protection against various workplace hazards, including slip resistance, cold insulation, and oil resistance.


Product Marking:
ISO 20347:2021 - compliance with the basic requirements of the standard for occupational footwear.
OB - meets the basic requirements for occupational footwear, including sole resistance to slip on ceramic surfaces covered with a NaLS solution.
CI - sole insulation from cold.
FO - sole resistance to diesel oil.
SR - sole resistance to slip on ceramic surfaces covered with glycerol.


Technical Specifications
































Upper and SolePVC
LiningFelt
Mounting SystemInjection Molding Method
Available Sizes39-47
ColorBlack
Height31 cm
StandardsProduct compliant with ISO 20347:2021
